class_notes: Online asynchronous and synchronous sessions. Face-to-face intensives dates: TBD
course_description: Students will use theories, models, tool and their application for improving health care quality and patient-centered care in a variety of settings both in the US and globally. Emphasis will be placed on the use of health informatics and interdisciplinary participation.
